alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:11PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Eton affecting Whitfield and Murray Counties. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Eton. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...Between 12 and 14 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands... pasture and fields begins along the river...upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 286 or Dawnville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EST Wednesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 08/19/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
